channel.title: New rights for donators
channel.description: Hey im running atomicscape 562 source. and i have no idea how t omake a player rights = 4 for donators. i would also like to make it so they can spawn. anyone know?

item.title: New rights for donators
item.dc:creator: @nardoscape nardoscape
item.description:
@nardoscape wrote:

umm well how do i add a rights to commandpackethandler.java, like it says, if player gets rights = 2 and i want to make it so, if player gets rights - 4? would i just copy and paste the 2 one then change to 4? and add commands? all i want to do is make it so donators and can spawn. mabye add a crown or something, thanks

Read full topic

item.title: New rights for donators
item.dc:creator: @tb1 tb
item.description:
@tb1 wrote:

I dont believe donors have a player right as sergiy stated. If its anything like 317s then the rights are like: 0 normal, 1 mod, 2 admin, 3 owner/co-owner, 4 hidden/co-owner.

I think you need to find some previous donor account names, and then search the files for the name. It should find it and you can either erase the name and add a new one or copy that code and place it under it and use that.

GL

Read full topic

item.title: New rights for donators
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

I know the theory. =) I’m not much of a java coder, but I was looking at codes and if you make it so Player = 0,
Mod = 1, Admin = 2, Donator = 3, Co-Owner = 4, And Owner = 5 you could code pickup as: if(playerRights >= 2) and then I’m sure your server already has ::pickup it would work. I’m guessing you would just add a comment like //Player = 0, Mod = 1, Admin = 2, Donator = 3, Co-Owner = 4, And Owner = 5 And just remember that. I’m not 100% sure on how to make donator 3. Hope I helped.

Read full topic
